entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this morning then 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 near noon then light this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
